"Mythic Voyage: A Journey Through Time and Legend" - A musical that delves into the myths and legends of various cultures, transporting the audience on a journey through time and space. The story follows a group of adventurers who embark on a quest to uncover the secrets of their past, encountering iconic figures and creatures along the way. The musical features a diverse range of musical styles, from ancient chants to contemporary pop, showcasing the richness and diversity of mythology.

"Echoes of the Soul" - A musical that explores the human experience of love, loss, and redemption through the lens of different cultures and time periods. The story weaves together a tapestry of stories, each one reflecting the universal themes of the human condition. The musical features a unique blend of musical styles, including jazz, blues, and world music, to create a powerful and emotional experience for the audience.

"The Memory Keepers" - A musical that delves into the power of memory and its impact on our lives. The story follows a group of people who are tasked with preserving the memories of a dying culture, struggling to keep their own memories alive in the process. The musical features a haunting score that blends traditional folk music with contemporary electronic elements, creating a dreamlike atmosphere that immerses the audience in the world of memory.

"Rainbow Revolution" - A musical that celebrates the diversity and inclusivity of modern society, telling the story of a group of individuals who come together to fight for their rights and embrace their identities. The musical features a vibrant and energetic score that blends pop, rock, and R&B, showcasing the diverse range of musical styles that reflect the rainbow of cultures and identities that make up our world.

"The Invisible Line" - A musical that explores the complexities of identity and belonging in a world where the lines between race, culture, and nationality are increasingly blurred. The story follows a group of characters who are struggling to find their place in the world, grappling with the complexities of identity and belonging in a rapidly changing society. The musical features a powerful and emotive score that blends traditional musical theater with contemporary electronic elements
